Package com.alyxferrari.jse3d.gfx

Class Display

java.lang.Object
com.alyxferrari.jse3d.gfx.Display
public class Display
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a jse3d frame.
Since:
1.0 beta
Author:
Alyx Ferrari, Sam Krug

    Disables text aliasing (enables text anti-aliasing);

    Disables text anti-aliasing (enables text aliasing).

    Disables clamping the y-axis viewing angle such that the user cannot move the camera past the y-axis.

    Enables aliasing (disables anti-aliasing).
    Display enableAntialiasing()
    Enables anti-aliasing (disables aliasing).
    Display enableCameraPositionPrinting()
    Enables printing the camera's actual position to (0,11) or a user-specified point on the frame.

    • Display

      public Display​(Scene scene)
      Constructs a Display object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      scene - The scene that should be rendered by this Display object.

    • Display

      public Display​(Scene scene, java.lang.String frameTitle)
      Constructs a Display object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      scene - The scene that should be rendered by this Display object.
      frameTitle - The title of the frame created by this Display object.

    • Display

      public Display​(Scene scene, java.lang.String frameTitle, int maxPointsTotal, int maxPointsObject, int maxObjects)
      Constructs a Display object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      scene - The scene that should be rendered by this Display object.
      frameTitle - The title of the frame created by this Display object.
      maxPointsTotal - The maximum number of points that will ever be in any Scene rendered.
      maxPointsObject - The maximum number of points that will ever be in any single Object3D.
      maxObjects - The maximum number of Object3Ds that will ever be in any Scene rendered.

    • Display

      Constructs a Display object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      scene - The scene that should be rendered by this Display object.
      frameTitle - The title of the frame created by this Display object.
      fovRadians - The FOV the scene should be rendered in, in radians.

      public Display​(Scene scene, java.lang.String frameTitle, boolean frameVisible, boolean renderPoints, java.awt.Dimension pointSize, int frameWidth, int frameHeight, double fovRadians, int maxPointsTotal, int maxPointsObject, int maxObjects)

    • Display

      public Display​(Scene scene, java.lang.String frameTitle, boolean frameVisible, boolean renderPoints, java.awt.Dimension pointSize, int frameWidth, int frameHeight, int fps, double fovRadians, int maxPointsTotal, int maxPointsObject, int maxObjects)
      Constructs a Display object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      scene - The scene that should be rendered by this Display object.
      frameTitle - The title of the frame created by this Display object.
      frameVisible - Whether the frame should be visible or not immediately after creation of this Display.
      renderPoints - Whether individual points should be rendered.
      pointSize - The preferred size in 2D of points rendered onto the frame.
      frameWidth - The preferred width of the frame.
      frameHeight - The preferred height of the frame.
      fps - The maximum FPS this Display should render the Scene in.
      fovRadians - The FOV the scene should be rendered in, in radians.
      maxPointsTotal - The maximum number of points that will ever be in any Scene rendered.
      maxPointsObject - The maximum number of points that will ever be in any single Object3D.
      maxObjects - The maximum number of Object3Ds that will ever be in any Scene rendered.
